nodes.title: Find a vegan restaurant near you - With the help of Svelte!
nodes.excerpt: Trying out Svelte was on my bucket list for months or maybe even for years. Especially after watching this talk by Rich Harris. When I was…
nodes.description: A small Svelte app that shows vegan restaurants on a map.

nodes.title: How to solve an everyday problem with Node.js, Gatsby and Netlify
nodes.excerpt: I really love radio dramas, especially Die drei ??? ("Three Investigators"). And I'm not alone with that. The series has now been in…
nodes.description: I built a random episode generator for audio dramas on Spotify before Netflix did the same for its series ;-). Here I outline the implementation based on Node.js, Gatsby and Netlify.
